content.title: Aerial Conductors
content.fullText: Aerial conductors used in extra-low voltage electrical installations shall be installed in accordance with the applicable requirements of Clause 3.12. Exceptions: 1. The clearances above ground or elevated areas need not apply provided that the requirements of Clause 3.3.1 are satisfied. 2. Bare conductors may be erected in accordance with the requirements for insulated conductors.
